description:
### 11.168 monochrome

Convert video to gray using custom color filter.

A description of the accepted options follows.

**cb**

    Set the chroma blue spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0. 

**cr**

    Set the chroma red spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0. 

**size**

    Set the color filter size. Allowed range is from .1 to 10. Default value is 1. 

**high**

    Set the highlights strength. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.
name: monochrome

options.description: Set the chroma blue spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0.
options.name: cb

options.description: Set the chroma red spot. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 0.

options.description: Set the highlights strength. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. Default value is 0.
options.name: high
